div.p: Y.-K.L. performed the majority of the model experiments and data analyses, and wrote the main manuscript text. R.I.C. worked closely with Y.-K.L. for model experimentations and sea ice concentration data analyses. S.M.J.N. organized a regular meeting as a group lead of this project, discussing the results with all authors. K.-M.K. had a number of additional discussion meetings with Y.-K.L. for interpretation of the results. All three coauthors carefully reviewed the manuscript to make edits and give Y.-K.L. comments/suggestions.
